CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 20, 1957, pg. A13 reads: "Committee Members - Planning of he 30th anniversary convention of Girl Friends, Inc., to be held in Pittsburgh, Pa., May 31-June 1, are Mrs. Marjorie (Oscar) Harris, co-chairman; Mrs. Alberta (Robert) Williams, president of the host chapter, and Mrs. Winnie (Garfield) Nickens, general chairman.  Members of the 22 chapters of the top-flight group of national socailites [sic] are expected in Steel City for this epoch making gathering. - Harris Photo."  Cutline of  related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 8, 1957, pg. A13 reads: "Magic Surrounds Girl Friends' Pittsburgh Meet - Convention Chairmen and president, who handled so beautifully the 30th convention of Girl Friends, were Marjorie Harris, Alberta Williams (president) and Winnie Nickens, Pittsburgh."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Girl Friends, Inc. committee members, from left: Marjorie Harris, Alberta Williams, and Winnie Nickens, seated on classical figure vignette patterned sofa, behind marble coffee table in interior, another version
